body: check if this is the FQDN or just a short name, if it's a short name, then this function might just return    and it's fine, there is no short domain name on linux  Will require native code.  VSO create date - 8/6/2015 8:00:00     VSO closed date - 10/29/2015 11:13:00
title: Implement NonWindowsGetDomainName
